Package com.kedzie.drawer


Interface Summary
DraggedDrawer.DrawerListener Listener for monitoring events about drawers.
DragLayout.DrawerListener Listener for monitoring events about drawers.
 

Class Summary
DraggedDrawer Draggable drawer with content and visible handle for all orientations.
DraggedDrawer.SimpleDrawerListener Default implementation of DraggedDrawer.DrawerListener
DragLayout Layout which handles sliding drawers in all directions.
DragLayout.DrawerHolder Reference to a drawer and helper functionality
DragLayout.LayoutParams Drawer related LayoutParams
DragLayout.SimpleDrawerListener Default implementation of DragLayout.DrawerListener
